edu.utsa.mobbed

Class Elements

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.utsa.mobbed.Elements

  • public class Elements
extends java.lang.Object
    Handler class for ELEMENTS table. Element entities identify time stamped data streams. An element may correspond to a single entity or may contain sub elements.
    Author:
    Arif Hossain, Jeremy Cockfield, Kay Robbins

    • Constructor Summary

      Elements(java.sql.Connection dbCon)
      Creates a Elements object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Elements

        public Elements(java.sql.Connection dbCon)
        Creates a Elements object.
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • addAttribute

        public void addAttribute(java.lang.String path,
                java.lang.Double[] numericValues,
                java.lang.String[] values)
                  throws MobbedException
        Add the attribute to a batch.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the attribute
        numericValues - the numeric values of the attribute
        values - the string values of the attribute
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • addElements

        public java.lang.String[] addElements()
                               throws MobbedException
        Adds the elements to a batch. A group element will be added to the batch prior to the child elements if a group label is given.
        Returns:
        the UUIDs of the elements that were added to the batch
        Throws:
        MobbedException

      • reset

        public void reset(java.lang.String datasetUuid,
         java.lang.String groupLabel,
         java.lang.String[] elementLabels,
         java.lang.String[] elementDescriptions,
         long[] elementPositions)
           throws MobbedException
        Sets the class fields of a Elements object.
        Parameters:
        datasetUuid - the UUID of the dataset associated with the elements
        groupLabel - the label of the parent element
        elementLabels - the labels of the child elements
        elementDescriptions - the descriptions of the elements
        elementPositions - the positions of the elements. starting at 1, 2, ...
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs

      • save

        public void save()
          throws MobbedException
        Saves all elements as a batch. All elements in the batch will be successfully written or the operation will be aborted.
        Throws:
        MobbedException - if an error occurs
